news.headline: CasinoRIX examines online casino players' key concerns and pain points based on last quarter's data.
news.summary: In Toronto on February 5, 2025, a comprehensive gambling solution called CasinoRIX was introduced. This innovative platform aims to streamline the decision-making process for players by offering professional advice and instant assistance. Recently, CasinoRIX published a detailed analysis addressing the key challenges faced by online casino enthusiasts. The report focuses on the main 'pain points' experienced by players in the industry. In the previous quarter, CasinoRIX witnessed significant growth in its user base, with a notable increase in customer engagement and satisfaction. This analytical article sheds light on the common issues encountered by online gamblers, offering valuable insights for both new and experienced players.

news.headline: Bargain Hunt starts Going-Out-of-Business sale at 92 locations in 10 states after bankruptcy filing, unprecedented discounts offered.
news.summary: Northbrook, Illinois - On February 5, 2025, Bargain Hunt, in the wake of filing for bankruptcy, has commenced unmatched Going-Out-of-Business sales at its 92 stores spread across 10 states. These sales are currently ongoing and are being overseen by the company's management team.

news.headline: Jones Soda appoints new CEO Scott Harvey & CFO Brian Meadows. Focus on driving growth. SEATTLE, Feb 5, 2025.
news.summary: Two seasoned executives, Scott Harvey and Brian Meadows, have been hired by Jones Soda Co. (CSE: JSDA, OTCQB: JSDA) with the aim of implementing a strategic plan focused on achieving profitable growth. This move was announced in Seattle on February 5, 2025. The company is looking to drive growth under their leadership.

news.headline: Vishay Intertechnology reports fiscal Q4 and full year 2024 results. Dec 31 revenue: $X. (NYSE: VSH)
news.summary: Vishay Intertechnology, Inc., a leading manufacturer of discrete semiconductors and passive electronic components, revealed its financial performance for the fiscal fourth quarter and full year ending on December 31, 2024. The company, listed on the NYSE under VSH, shared the results from this period on February 5, 2025, from its headquarters in Malvern, Pennsylvania. Being among the top producers globally, Vishay Intertechnology continues to play a significant role in the industry.

news.headline: 350k more digital subscribers reported by NY Times, with 10.7% operating profit rise to $170.5M in Q4.
news.summary: The company reported a 10.7% increase in adjusted operating profit for the fourth quarter compared to the same period last year. This brought the profit to $170.5 million.

news.headline: Analysts foresee Bitcoin’s price consolidation ending by February's end due to rising demand and investor interest.
news.summary: Experts anticipate that the ongoing period of price stabilization for Bitcoin is likely to conclude by the conclusion of February. This forecast is based on indications pointing towards a rise in demand for BTC and growing interest from investors.

news.headline: Dante Genomics becomes Dante Omics AI, offering multiomics platform, integrating genomics, RNA, proteomics & spatial transcriptomics under one AI framework. Provides comprehensive view of human biology, accelerating breakthroughs for healthcare. Expansion started in 2023.
news.summary: Dante Genomics, a prominent company in AI-powered genomic analysis, has recently transformed into Dante Omics AI to emphasize its shift towards a multiomics approach. This expansion, which began in 2023, combines genomics, RNA, proteomics, and spatial transcriptomics within an advanced AI system. By merging these different omics fields, Dante Omics AI provides a holistic perspective on human biology. This development aims to expedite discoveries for medical clinics, healthcare professionals, researchers, and pharmaceutical companies.

news.headline: Core Scientific reports January 2025 updates: self-mined bitcoin earned 256, hosted customer bitcoin 17, energized hash rate at 18.5.
news.summary: Core Scientific, Inc. (Nasdaq: CORZ), a prominent player in digital infrastructure for high-performance computing and bitcoin mining, disclosed unaudited production and operations data for January 2025. In the summary of key metrics, the company reported earning 256 self-mined bitcoins and 17 hosted bitcoins in January 2025, compared to 291 and 18, respectively, in December 2024. The average daily self-mined bitcoin earnings were 8.3 in January, down from 9.4 in December. Additionally, the self-mining energized hash rate was recorded at 18.5.

news.headline: Vestas Wind Systems topped estimated earnings by 31.0% in Q4. For full details, visit Benzinga.com.
news.summary: On Wednesday, February 5, 2025, Vestas Wind Systems (OTC:VWDRY) disclosed its Q4 earnings at 03:00 AM. The report revealed that the company outperformed anticipated earnings by a significant margin of 31.0%, indicating a robust financial performance for that period. For further details on this earnings announcement, the complete story can be accessed on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Ceva-Waves Wi-Fi 6 IP enables WQ9201 chip for fast data transmission in consumer electronics products.
news.summary: A new WQ9201 chip has been launched for consumer electronics products, designed with 2x2 MIMO Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth technology. This chip is intended for devices requiring high-speed data transmission, including smartphones, tablets, PCs, TVs, and set-top-boxes. Released on Feb. 5, 2025, in ROCKVILLE, Md., the chip is from Ceva, Inc. (NASDAQ: CEVA), a prominent provider of silicon and software intellectual property.

news.headline: CD&R names Sam Camens as Managing Director to lead health and welfare strategy, supporting diligence and investments.
news.summary: CD&R, a leading investment firm, has named Sam Camens as the new Managing Director on February 5, 2025. In this role, Sam will oversee the firm's health and welfare strategy, focusing on supporting diligence and investments. He will also collaborate with management teams to drive growth and innovation within the sector. This announcement signifies CD&R's emphasis on strengthening its presence in the health and welfare space under Sam's leadership.

news.headline: AXA XL and Royal Academy of Arts team up for 2025 AXA Art Prize UK, offering £10,000 for top figurative artwork at RA.
news.summary: In London on February 5, 2025, AXA XL announced its continued collaboration with the Royal Academy of Arts, London (RA), for the AXA Art Prize UK 2025. The esteemed prize will grant £10,000 to an exceptional piece of figurative art exhibited at the RA's 2025 Summer...

news.headline: National reading scores declined, concerns raised by Education Week, NY Times, and Washington Post. Report card released Jan 29, 2025.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, in Brooklyn, New York, the report card of the nation was made public. The release date of the report was January 29, 2025, revealing a distressing drop in national reading scores. Various reputable sources such as Education Week, The New York Times, and The Washington Post expressed worry over the findings.

news.headline: Natural Grocers offering up to 44% off party essentials on Feb 6-9, 2025. Leading organic grocery retailer anticipates high savings.
news.summary: Enjoy discounts of up to 44% on essential party items from February 6 to 9, 2025 in LAKEWOOD, Colo. Natural Grocers®, a top organic and natural grocery retailer, is preparing for game day with unbeatable deals on all necessary snack and party supplies.

news.headline: CDW authorizes $750M in share repurchases and declares $0.625 quarterly dividend per share.
news.summary: Vernon Hills, Illinois - CDW Corporation (Nasdaq: CDW), a prominent provider of IT solutions across various sectors in the US, UK, and Canada, has disclosed that its Board of Directors approved a $750 million enlargement of the share repurchase initiative. Additionally, a quarterly cash dividend of $0.625 per common share has been declared. The dividend payout is scheduled for March 11, 2025, benefiting all stakeholders.

news.headline: Extreme Networks, Inc. will present at two investor conferences in Feb and March 2025. Nasdaq: EXTR will attend the SFG conference on Feb 27 in NY and the Morgan Stanley conference.
news.summary: Extreme Networks, Inc., a leading provider of AI-driven networking automation, has revealed its upcoming investor conferences. The company's Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, Kevin Rhodes, is set to attend the Susquehanna Financial Group, LLLP (SFG) Twelfth Annual Technology Conference in New York, NY on Thursday, February 27, 2025. During this event, he will be participating in multiple meetings throughout the day. Additionally, Extreme Networks will also be present at the Morgan Stanley Technology, Media & Telecom Conference.

news.headline: Job seekers and employees are more confident about their career prospects in Q1 of 2025, as per Vaco's Talent Pulse Report.
news.summary: In Nashville, Tennessee, as of February 5, 2025, there is a noticeable increase in workers' resilience and readiness to enhance their skills amidst evolving employment conditions. Recent surveys by Vaco reveal that job seekers and employees are displaying higher levels of confidence in their career opportunities for the initial quarter of 2025. This positive trend reflects a shift in the mindset of professionals looking to adapt to the changing job market landscape and embrace upskilling.

news.headline: Shainin names finalists for 2025 Dorian Awards honoring problem-solvers in engineering; from Philips, Stellantis, and Baker Hughes.
news.summary: In Northville, Michigan on February 5, 2025, Shainin, a renowned company specializing in problem-solving approaches, has revealed the nominees for the 2025 Dorian Awards. This distinguished accolade honors remarkable accomplishments in engineering, quality, and operational excellence.

news.headline: 32 Virginia Cancer Specialists named NorthernVirginia Magazine's 2025 Top Doctors, honored by peers. Largest cancer practice in NoVa.
news.summary: 32 physicians from Virginia Cancer Specialists were recognized as the Top Doctor winners for 2025 by NorthernVirginia magazine. The medical professionals were nominated by their peers in the field. The prestigious award highlights the excellence of Virginia Cancer Specialists, the most extensive private cancer practice in Northern Virginia. The announcement was made in Fairfax, Virginia on February 5, 2025.

news.headline: Zenas BioPharma reports progress in 2024 with obexelimab trials for autoimmune diseases, eyeing global expansion in 2025.
news.summary: Moving forward with Phase 2 and Phase 3 studies of obexelimab, a novel inhibitor targeting CD-19 and FcγRIIb to regulate B cell activity.

news.headline: Checkmarx introduces Checkmarx Zero Research Hub for sharing AppSec and software supply chain threat intelligence.Key numbers: 100+ conference sessions, VP Erez Yalon leads team.
news.summary: Checkmarx, a prominent provider of cloud-native application security solutions, has revealed the establishment of a cooperative application security research hub by its security research team, Checkmarx Zero. Erez Yalon, the VP of Security Research at Checkmarx, stated that the Checkmarx Zero team has introduced this initiative. The team, known for its extensive industry expertise, has been actively sharing their discoveries with the research community through various channels, including a dedicated blog and over 100 conference presentations. This move is expected to foster collaboration within the application security sector and software development industry.

news.headline: Eptura, global worktech leader, announces strategic leadership appointments & new service offerings in response to strong market growth.
news.summary: Eptura, a prominent global leader in worktech, revealed strategic internal promotions in Atlanta to capitalize on significant market expansion and recent achievements.

news.headline: Ricky Ramon joins OXIO as SVP of Customer Experience, bringing over 25 years of telecom experience from Verizon and TracFone.
news.summary: In New York, OXIO, a prominent Telecom-as-a-Service provider, has named Ricky Ramon as the new senior vice president of customer experience. With over 25 years of experience in telecom and customer operations, Ramon previously held key roles at Verizon and TracFone. His appointment aims to strengthen OXIO's leadership team and elevate customer experience quality. Ramon will be responsible for leading customer operations at OXIO.

news.headline: D-Wave to hold Qubits 2025 conference in AZ, focusing on quantum computing. Dates: March 31-April 1.
news.summary: D-Wave Quantum Inc., a key player in quantum computing systems, software, and services and the first commercial provider of quantum computers globally, declared the upcoming Qubits 2025 quantum computing user conference in Scottsdale, Arizona, scheduled for March 31 and April 1. With the theme "Quantum Realized," the event will include speeches by D-Wave executives, clients, and prominent figures in the industry. This conference aims to showcase the latest advancements and insights in the field of quantum computing.

news.headline: Eastman Credit Union partners with WaveCX to boost digital strategy, incorporating accessible product demos for member engagement, education, and adoption.
news.summary: An announcement was made by WaveCX, a personalized digital product engagement solutions provider for financial institutions, revealing their partnership with Eastman Credit Union (ECU). The collaboration aims to boost ECU's digital strategy by integrating user-friendly product demos across various platforms. This move is geared towards increasing member engagement, providing education, and encouraging product adoption. ECU, a full-service financial institution, is set to benefit from this partnership, given their track record of providing value to their customers.

news.headline: Trump aims to launch a US Sovereign Wealth Fund. What is it about? - Source not disclosed.
Global formwork plywood market valued at US$ 6.4 billion in 2024, expected to reach US$ 7.9 billion by 2034 with key players like Altrad Group and Doka GmbH. Growing at 2.1% CAGR.
news.summary: The global formwork plywood market was valued at US$6,377.3 million in 2024 and is projected to grow at a CAGR of 2.1% to reach US$7,850.5 million by 2034. Key factors driving this growth include government infrastructure development projects, private investments in construction, and the need for efficient formwork solutions. Innovations in plywood technology, such as high-performance adhesives and sustainable materials, are also contributing to market growth. The market is expected to see a rise in demand for quality-eco formwork plywood to align with the trend for sustainable construction practices. North America is estimated to hold a 6% market share in 2034. Predominating market players include Altrad Group, BrandSafway, Cemex, Doka GmbH, and PERI Group. The commercial end-use segment is forecasted to grow at a CAGR of 6%, creating an absolute $ opportunity of US$802.1 million between 2024 and 2034.

news.headline: NationsBenefits invests in CareCar to enhance transportation access for health plan members, benefiting millions.
news.summary: In Plantation, Florida, a strategic investment has been made by NationsBenefits®, a prominent provider of supplemental benefits and healthcare fintech solutions, in CareCar, a leading non-emergency medical transportation (NEMT) company. This partnership aims to bolster their NEMT services, ultimately improving healthcare access for numerous health plan members nationwide. Addressing transportation obstacles is a critical issue, and through this co-operation, both companies are set to make a significant impact.

news.headline: Yelp releases 2024 Trust & Safety Report, highlights measures taken to protect content quality.
news.summary: In San Francisco, Yelp Inc. (NYSE:YELP) has issued its latest Trust & Safety Report, outlining efforts made in 2024 to safeguard the quality of content on its platform. The report highlights enhancements to its recommendation software to prioritize trustworthy reviews and alerts users to compensated or incentivized reviews. This year, Yelp took significant steps to protect the integrity of its platform and ensure reliable information for its users.

news.headline: McDermott finishes Kikeh subsea gas lift project in East Malaysia early for PTTEP Sabah Oil Limited, started in Q1 2024.
news.summary: Houston-based company McDermott recently disclosed the completion of transportation, installation, and commissioning tasks related to the Kikeh subsea gas lift endeavor. This project was assigned by PTTEP Sabah Oil Limited in early 2024. McDermott's successful execution of this project showcases their proficiency in handling such undertakings.

news.headline: Halcones finds high-grade gold samples in Chile's Polaris Project: 20.05 g/t, 13.08 g/t, 8.54 g/t, and 6.67 g/t from recent field work.
news.summary: In Toronto on February 5, 2025, Halcones Precious Metals Corp. (TSX – V: HPM) shared updates on the initial field program at the Polaris gold project in Chile. The company conducted its first field program at Polaris, with geologists undertaking mapping and sampling in a section of the project area. The samples taken were continuous 1m long chip samples for accurate representation. This marks a significant step for Halcones in exploring the potential of the Polaris project.

news.headline: Disney exceeds expectations with strong results from streaming services and 'Moana 2'.
Teladoc Health acquiring Catapult Health to enhance care capabilities with preventive services and chronic care management.
news.summary: Teladoc Health is set to improve its preventive care and chronic care management capabilities through a strategic acquisition. This move will also facilitate the expansion of at-home testing services. This acquisition is expected to significantly enhance Teladoc Health's offerings in preventive and chronic care, as well as expand its reach in the at-home testing market. This strategic decision underscores Teladoc Health's commitment to providing comprehensive healthcare solutions to its customers.

news.headline: LiveWire Group, Inc. posted 2024 Q4 and full year results, reducing cash burn by 40% and focusing on EV leadership.
news.summary: Milwaukee-based LiveWire Group, Inc. (NYSE: LVWR) announced its fourth quarter and full-year 2024 financial results. The company reported that in 2024, they implemented various strategies to adapt to market changes, effectively transforming challenges into opportunities to revamp the business for the upcoming year. LiveWire anticipates a 40% or greater reduction in cash burn for 2025 when compared to 2024. The firm is committed to solidifying its position as a frontrunner in the electric vehicle industry, leveraging its top-notch products and exceptional services.

news.headline: UK's PM Starmer: I'm determined to remove barriers to trade with the EU

Field Vision Sports collaborates with ShotQuality to create a new standard for measuring NFL offensive performance using real-time data.- Scott Bouska, Founder of Field Vision Sports- Date: Feb. 5, 2025- Source: PRNewswire
news.summary: "Embracing the unpredictability of football, envision a scenario where real-time on-field actions can be quantified to anticipate forthcoming events. This vision is now a reality through our partnership with ShotQuality," disclosed Scott Bouska, Field Vision Sports' Founder. The development was confirmed in New York on Feb. 5, 2025, as part of a joint effort to revolutionize analyzing sports gameplay.

news.headline: Reynolds Consumer Products announces 2024 financial results and gives 2025 outlook from Lake Forest, reporting strong performance.
news.summary: In Lake Forest, Illinois, Reynolds Consumer Products has announced its financial results for the fourth quarter as well as the full year of 2024. The company reported its earnings and provided an outlook for 2025. Key numbers include revenue, earnings, and projections for the upcoming year.

news.headline: ReposiTrak and Upshop join to close traceability gaps with end-to-end solution. Collaboration seeks to enhance supply chain efficiency.
news.summary: Salt Lake City and Austin, Texas - ReposiTrak and Upshop have teamed up to provide a comprehensive solution that addresses traceability challenges. This collaboration aims to close existing gaps in the supply chain by offering an end-to-end solution. By joining forces, ReposiTrak and Upshop are working towards enhancing transparency and efficiency in the industry.

news.headline: Flexter partners with Drivalia UK to expand vehicle rental inventory, enhancing options for consumers.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, in Montreal, Flexter, a top player in the truck and van rental sector, revealed an exciting new strategic alliance with Drivalia UK, a division of the renowned European automotive rental and mobility firm Drivalia. This partnership marks a significant step forward for both companies, combining Flexter's expertise in the industry with Drivalia's vast network and experience.

news.headline: Criteo reports record Q4 2024 results, CEO appointed, $225M used for share repurchase, buyback authorization increased to $200M aiming for mid-single-digit growth in 2025.
news.summary: In 2024, Michael Komasinski was named the Chief Executive Officer of Criteo S.A., a leading company. They allocated a significant $225 million towards buying back shares, marking a record for the organization. Additionally, they decided to enhance their existing share buyback program to allow for an additional $200 million in repurchases. Looking ahead to 2025, Criteo S.A. is aiming for mid-single-digit growth.

news.headline: Bladex (NYSE: BLX) schedules conference call on Feb 28, 2025 at 10:00am ET to discuss 4Q24 results.
news.summary: Panama City, on February 5th, 2025 - Banco Latinoamericano de Comercio Exterior, S.A. (NYSE: BLX) has extended a warm invitation for all to join its conference call discussing the results of the 4th quarter of 2024. The event is scheduled for Friday, February 28th, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. Eastern Time. During the call, representatives from Bladex will be presenting.

news.headline: First in the industry, Plug introduces spot pricing for green hydrogen, transforming market dynamics.  #revolutionary
BioXcel Therapeutics progressing with Phase 3 trial of BXCL501 for bipolar and schizophrenia agitation.
news.summary: Enrollment of patients is progressing in the SERENITY At-Home Phase 3 trial involving BXCL501 for the acute treatment of agitation linked to bipolar disorders or schizophrenia. The study includes a significant number of participants and aims to evaluate the effectiveness of BXCL501 in managing agitation in individuals with these mental health conditions.

news.headline: Compass, Inc. will announce Q4 and full-year 2024 results on Feb 18, the largest US residential real estate brokerage.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, Compass, Inc. (NYSE: COMP), the leading residential real estate brokerage in the U.S. based on sales volume, revealed that it is set to disclose its financial performance for the fourth quarter and full-year of 2024 after the market closes on February 18, 2025. This announcement coincides with the company's reputation as a major player in the real estate sector in the country. Investors and industry experts are eagerly anticipating the release of these figures to gain insights into the company's financial health and outlook for the future.

news.headline: Agrify adds Peter Shapiro and Sanjay Tolia to its Board of Directors in latest announcement.

Harley-Davidson reported $688 million revenue for Q4, operating income loss of $193 million, and global motorcycle shipments down 53%.2025 outlook states flat to down revenue, $70-$80 million loss for LiveWire, and $225-$250 million capital investments.
news.summary: Harley-Davidson, Inc. reported its Q4 and full-year 2024 financial results, with a focus on the impact of cyclilcal challenges due to high interest rates on consumer confidence. Despite this, H-D saw growth in the U.S. Touring segment, reaching a market share of 74.5% in '24. The Company reported a full-year EPS of $3.44, with global motorcycle shipments down 17% to 148,862 units. In Q4, HDMC global motorcycle shipments dropped 53% to 14,010 units, with revenue at $420 million, down 47% YoY. For 2025, HDMC anticipates flat to 5% lower revenue and an operating income margin of 7.0% to 8.0%. LiveWire is expected to sell 1,000 – 1,500 electric motorcycles with an operating loss of $70 to $80 million. Overall, H-D projects diluted EPS to remain flat to down 5% in 2025. The Company generated $1.1 billion from operating activities, paid dividends of $91 million, and repurchased $450 million of shares. They had cash and equivalents of $1.6 billion at year end. H-D continues its mission to lead through innovation, evolution, and emotion, aiming to be the most desirable motorcycle brand globally. H-D Financial Services saw a 9% increase in revenue for 2024. LiveWire, the electric motorcycle division, saw revenues down 31% YoY. The company warns of uncertainties related to tariffs, market conditions, product development, and other factors that may impact future results.

news.headline: EyePoint reports positive results in Phase 2 VERONA trial of DURAVYU™ for Diabetic Macular Edema. Primary endpoint met by both doses (1.34mg and 2.7mg) with prolonged time to first supplemental injection compared to aflibercept control.
news.summary: Both doses of DURAVYU (1.34mg and 2.7mg) met the primary endpoint, showcasing a longer duration before needing a supplementary injection compared to the control group receiving aflibercept.

news.headline: Aleph Group marks 20-year anniversary, enabling digital transformation in emerging economies with media, fintech, and edtech.
news.summary: In Miami on February 5, 2025, Aleph Group, a prominent global facilitator of digital advertising, fintech services, and education technology, celebrates its commitment to fueling digital transformation in emerging economies. This company plays a key role in integrating digital media, fintech, and education technology, ultimately driving significant progress in this sector.

news.headline: Sable Resources Ltd. reports up to 2.6% Cu at Core Mountain, British Columbia property. #mining #copper
news.summary: In Vancouver, British Columbia, on February 5, 2025, Sable Resources Ltd. (TSXV:SAE | OTCQB:SBLRF) shared positive findings from its initial assessment of the Core Mountain property in west central British Columbia. The property, fully owned by Sable, underwent a thorough field review, yielding encouraging results.

news.headline: Aurora Cannabis reports Q3 2025 results: $88.2M total revenue, 37% YoY increase, $31.2M net income (282% YoY), $23.1M EBITDA (316% YoY). Maintains $180M cash, debt-free status.
news.summary: Aurora Cannabis Inc. reported impressive financial results for the third quarter of fiscal 2025 with total net revenue of $88.2 million, up 37% year-over-year. The company achieved record net income of $31.2 million, a 282% increase from the previous year, and record adjusted EBITDA of $23.1 million, up 316% year-over-year. Notably, they achieved positive free cash flow of $27.4 million in Q3 and have a strong balance sheet with $180 million in cash and no debt in their cannabis business. The growth was primarily driven by the global medical cannabis business, which saw record net revenue of $68.1 million, a 51% increase year-over-year. Additionally, plant propagation business revenue increased by 22%. Aurora's consumer cannabis business saw a slight decrease in revenue. The company expects continued revenue growth in the fourth quarter of 2025 with strong margins and positive adjusted EBITDA. They also filed a preliminary base shelf prospectus for potential future financing activities.
